name: bootstrap-extras
description: A collection of small, re-usable jQuery plugins to extend Bootstrap's functionality.
author: Driftwood Cove Designs <powderflask@gmail.com>

scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prod:scripts -s && npm run build:styles -s && npm run build:docs -s
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-dev:scripts -s && npm run build:styles -s && npm run build:docs -s
scripts.build:docs: cp dist/* docs/assets/ && cp markup/* docs/components/_markup/ && cd docs; bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.serve:dev: cd docs; bundle exec jekyll serve
